Name: Among Trees
About the game: EXPLORE Explore a living, colorful world, ranging from dense forests to dark caves. BUILD Your cabin grows with you: build new rooms to unlock additional game mechanics, including cooking, gardening, crafting and sewing. GROW Nurture delicate (and delicious) plants in your greenhouse. Eat them raw or make a stew for better nutritional values. SURVIVE Dangerous animals roam some areas in the woods. Better keep a distance if you can. (Among Trees also includes a ZEN mode without dangerous animals) BEST FRIENDS FOREVER While the wilderness can be dangerous, it doesn't mean you canâ€™t make new friends. Adopt a Fox Pet who you can feed, pet, and train to help you find loot.
